snippet: The guests, who included fashion world insiders and boldfaced names like Maggie Gyllenhaal and Cindy Sherman, gathered for cocktails, delicious food, warm conversation and a graceful new collection.
abstract: The guests, who included fashion world insiders and boldfaced names like Maggie Gyllenhaal and Cindy Sherman, gathered for cocktails, delicious food, warm conversation and a graceful new collection.

headline.main: Rachel Comey's Intimate Dinner to Kick Off Fashion Week
